医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
AI驱动的鼠标视觉皮层的数字双胞胎就像飞行员可能在飞行模拟器中练习操纵一样，科学家可能很快就可以对小鼠大脑进行现实模拟进行实验。在一项新的研究中，斯坦福大学的医学研究人员和合作者使用人工智能模型来构建处理视觉信息的小鼠大脑部分的“数字双胞胎”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/ai-powered-digital-twin-twin-of-mouse-mouse-visual-cortex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/ai-powered-digital-twin-twin-twin-of-mouse-visual-cortex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1444d0ab-001f-4604-AD49-CD9A4B0FE7B4 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 00:21:48 -0400 AI-powered digital twin of mouse visual cortex
您的牛奶选择会影响偏头痛吗？根据一项大型基于NHANES的研究，脱脂牛奶的消费量与美国成年人的偏头痛患病率较低有关。即使在调整了生活方式，饮食和人口统计学因素之后，该协会仍然很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/could-your-milk-choice-actect-migraines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/could-your-milk-choice-aftect-migraines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c0e24a7-b1d0-411d-a39f-a39f-5fa8b1679f1b Wed, 09 Apr 2025 23:51:00 -0400 Could your milk choice affect migraines?
研究发现，印度，中国和美国将在2050年之前驱动全球糖尿病负担全球糖尿病的死亡和残疾正在上升，尤其是在印度，中国和美国，2型糖尿病（T2DM）推动了这一趋势。 1型糖尿病（T1DM）负担正在下降，但不平等正在扩大，到2050年，预测显示T2DM急剧上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/india-china-china-china-and-the-us-will-drive-drive-global-daibetes-burden-burden-by-2050--2050 study-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/india-china-china-and-the----------------------------------------------------by-by-2050-study-study-study-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b93Edba-5CA2-41AF-A970-F30053E7CDD4 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 23:02:00 -0400 India, China, and the US will drive global diabetes burden by 2050, study finds
肺部的肺炎肺炎在肺部疾病中鉴定出源自环境中常见的腐生性黑色真菌的属通常与免疫功能低下宿主的皮肤感染有关，很少表现为肺炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/exophiala-pneumonia-pneumonia-indistified-in-in-mimmunoctent--withman-with-with-lung-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/exophiala-pneumonia-pneumonia-indistifud-in-in-mimmunocetent-withman-with-with-with-lung-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e75b6083-889f-4C43-B024-5AC67B1622A7 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 23:01:33 -0400 Exophiala pneumonia identified in immunocompetent woman with lung disease
WPI研究人员将获得NSF职业奖，以为医疗应用创建生物粘附剂伍斯特理工学院（WPI）研究人员正在通过将水凝胶和类似胶状的聚合物汇总在一起，以安全可靠地将人体组织与植入体内的治疗装置（例如起搏器，胰岛素泵和人造关节）一起开发新的医学胶粘剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/wpi-researcher-receives-nsf-career-award-award-to-to-create-create-bioadhisives-for for-Medical-Applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/wpi-researcher-receives-nsf-career-award-to-create-create-bioeate-bioadhisives-for for-medical-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38E5B249-F9F3-4790-A1E2-E76D17FD1225 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 23:00:00 -0400 WPI researcher receives NSF CAREER Award to create bioadhesives for medical applications
研究揭示了喷气滞后如何影响睡眠时间和恢复Nus Yong Yong lin医学院（NUS Medicine）的睡眠和认知中心研究人员进行的一项合作研究发现，虽然睡眠持续时间迅速恢复，但在跨时区旅行时，睡眠时间和睡眠体系结构可能需要更长的时间才能重新调整。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-how-jet-jet-lag-actects-sleep-timing-indiming-and-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-how-jet-jet-lag-actects-sleep-timing-indiming-and-timing-and-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51731E33-AC0A-4B48-A110-6EED2E91FB79 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 22:55:00 -0400 Study reveals how jet lag affects sleep timing and recovery
关于肌动脉症如何破坏肌肉功能的新见解患有自身免疫性疾病的人肌无力的肌肉无力，可能会影响我们用来眨眼，微笑甚至移动身体的任何肌肉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-insights-into-how-how-myasthenia-myasthenia-gravis-antibodies-distrupp--distrupt-muscle-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-insights-into-how-how-myasthenia-gravis-antibodies-distrupp--distrupp--muscle-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A710188-4BAF-42ED-AF74-5F8777228340B Wed, 09 Apr 2025 22:44:49 -0400 New insights into how myasthenia gravis antibodies disrupt muscle function
新的智能服装跟踪一个人的姿势和锻炼康奈尔大学（Cornell University）的研究人员开发了一种新型的智能服装，可以跟踪一个人的姿势和运动锻炼，但看起来像普通衬衫一样，看起来，穿着和洗涤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-smart-clothing-tracks-a-person-posture-and-posture-and-cercise-routine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-smart-clothing-tracks-a-a-person-posture-and-posture-and-cercise-recercise-routine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb262a48-06c2-4545-aab0-aab0-ebf869851ea5 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 22:32:34 -0400 New smart clothing tracks a person's posture and exercise routine
Sylvester Cancer Center推出了高级神经内分泌肿瘤患者的临床试验现已针对高级神经内分泌肿瘤患者的临床试验开放，可在迈阿密米勒大学医学院的一部分西尔维斯特综合癌症中心入学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/sylvester-cancer-cancer-center-launches-clinical-clinical-clinical-trial-for-patients with-nigh-nigh-negrade-neuroendocrine-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/sylvester-cancer-cancer-center-center-launches-clinical-clinical-clinical-trial-for-patients with-gigh-nigh-neuroendocrine-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4Aef17b1-9f6e-4CE3-8189-E767D75937C5 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 22:23:50 -0400 Sylvester Cancer Center launches clinical trial for patients with high-grade neuroendocrine tumors
Calibr-Skaggs获得了自身免疫性疾病患者的FDA批准，以测试Scar-T治疗Scripps Research的药物发现部门的创新药物研究所钙纤维 - Skaggs研究所今天宣布，FDA已清除了研究可切换的嵌合抗原受体T细胞（Scar-scar-t）治疗（CLBR001 + SWI019）的调查新药（IND）申请。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/calibr-skaggs-receivs-freceives-fda-approval-to-test-scar-t-t-therapy in-patients-with-autommune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/calibr-skaggs-receivs-fda-approval-to-test-test-test-scar-t-car-t-theraphy-ptheraphions in-patients-with-autoimmmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3665A215A215-F033-433F-B50D-B50D-AE53C4E777358 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 22:20:00 -0400 Calibr-Skaggs receives FDA approval to test sCAR-T therapy in patients with autoimmune diseases
